name: Night Class (j123r)
description:
Night Class

Team: The G.E.N.T.S.

Description: What could be worse than a test during your night class?

Find the answers to your test by looking them up or looking at your classmate's

test, but don't look away from your paper too long or Professor Zhang will catch you!

Controls: Use the mouse to navigate the camera around the classroom. Clicking on the test

or the phone will interact with the buttons. Listen for the professor to clear his throat

since that means he's getting close! Look at the professor to get him to go back to the whiteboard.
